title: list-domain-users output
description: List users of a given accounts domain

user.title: A user descriptor
user.description: Basic description of a user: name and (person) display name

display_name.title: Display name
display_name.description: Preferred name of a person to be used when displaying entries (RFC 2798/2.3)

locked.title: Locked
locked.description: True, if the user account has been locked, preventing the user from logging in
